page.title: 17 RELIGIOUS COMMUNE-WENTHILLS
page.content: On the eastern side of Stapleton Park is a small area known as "The Brotherhood Church". They base their beliefs on The Sermon on the Mount. The Brotherhood was founded in 1921, and at that time there was quite a large group, but now only two families live there regularly. They grow much of their own food, and keep bees. They sell the honey from the commune. There is no church building as such, but at time quite large gatherings are held there. The day before our visit, three hundred people had held a meeting there. The group have strong connections with the Peace Movement. There was a banner saying "War is always wrong".
